漢羅台文: 毋過原住民各族語佮客語已經怙其他法源成做「國家語言」--矣，
台羅: m̄-koh guân-tsū-bîn kok tso̍k-gí kah Kheh-gí í-king kōo kî-thann huat-guân tsiânn-tsò “kok-ka gí-giân”--ah,
台羅數字調: m7-koh4 guan5-tsu7-bin5 kok4 tsok8-gi2 kah4 kheh4-gi2 i2-king1 koo7 ki5-thann1 huat4-guan5 tsiann5-tso3“kok4-ka1 gi2-gian5”--ah4,
白話字: m̄-koh goân-chū-bîn kok cho̍k-gí kah Kheh-gí í-keng kō͘ kî-thaⁿ hoat-goân chiâⁿ-chò“kok-ka gí-giân”--ah,
